titleStmt.title: Wanted to Marry Harran
SHAWI Corpus
titleStmt.funder: Funded by the FWF Austrian Science Fund under the number P 33574

publicationStmt.distributor: Austrian Center for Digital Humanities and Cultural Heritage

monogr.title: A Digital Dictionary of Shawi Arabic

prefixDef.p: Private URIs using the teiCorpusHeader prefix are pointers to any element in the SHAWI teiCorpus document.
Private URIs using the share prefix are pointers to audio file residing on the SHAWI network share.
Private URIs using the geo prefix are pointers to the xml:id attribute on a place element in VICAV Geodata list.
Private URIs using the zotid prefix are pointers to the xml:id attribute on a biblStruct element in the TEI export of the VICAV Zotero Group library.
Private URIs using the dict prefix are pointers to the xml:id attribute on a entry in the SHAWI glossary.

spanGrp.span: Once upon a time May God give you a long life master Stephan! This (story) should be remembered by you, so listen to it well!
There was a young man for whom the time of marriage had come. He wanted his father to marry him.
He said, “Father, marry me! Father, marry me!” But his father did not marry him.
Maybe his situation was not convenient, maybe he had no time, or maybe he had no money.
Here with us marriage is quite difficult, it is expensive.
One day then he said to his wif to his mother, “Enough! Let us marry him. Let us find a woman for him.”
They married him and made a bridal procession for him. In the evening they brought him there to let him enter the nuptial chamber.
They opened the door and let him enter. He consummated the marriage and when he had consummated the marriage,
when he had entered the bride, when he had screwed her once, he said, “Wow! How good is this!” (lit. how good is its taste)
He fucked her once and said, “How good is this! This is really great!”
Then he went out. After coming out he said, “Give me a stick!” They said, “Dude, what you want to do with the stick?”
He said, “Hey, give me a stick! I want to fuck his mother. My father, this son of a bitch has always fun with my mother.
He amuses himself with my mother, he makes love to her, but he did not teach it to me. He did not marry me. I want to fuck his mother and I will kill him.
